segments.text: I see an adult woman standing serenely at the sink, seemingly unaware of the chaos brewing around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is overflowing from the sink, forming a puddle that spreads across the kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice how fixated she is on polishing a plate, as if nothing else matters in that moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already submerged in the water, yet her expression is completely calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel surprised by her oblivion to the reality at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s a little boy on a stool, stretching towards the cookie jar, his little body teetering dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is eagerly waiting, her hand raised as if to catch a cookie falling from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What an innocent little scene, yet it’s rife with potential disaster and mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost predict the moment when the boy loses his balance and the whole scenario turns chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The domesticity of the moment feels so fragile, like a bubble waiting to burst.
segments.speaker: PAR
